= How to Add a Sample Header Application
:page-layout: post
:page-category: Tutorials

== Introduction
The purpose of this tutorial is to walk through the process of setting up a sample header application with Oracle IDCS through the SPGateway Admin console.

[NOTE]
====
The following are required:

* Admin login for SPGateway Admin console.
* SPGateway appliance configured with Oracle IDCS tenant.
* Access to and ability to modify local hosts file.
====

== Create the Application in SPGateway

include::{docdir}/./fragments/frag-add-sample-header-app.adoc[]

. Select the *SPGW Sample IDCS Header App* option from the left column menu, and click *Create*.
+
image::spgateway-sample-header-app-idcs-05.png[]
